title: Given the current severe drought status in the area, why hasn\'t CFPUA instituted water conservation restriction as in years past?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  Despite the drought, water supplies are stable. You can read more here: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110708/ARTICLES/110709761?p=all&tc=pgall
